abstract.t: This document gives a construction for KEM-based authentication in TLS 1.3. The overall design approach is a simple: usage of Key Encapsulation Mechanisms (KEM) for certificate-based authentication. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the mailing list (), which is archived at . Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/claucece/draft-celi-wiggers-tls-authkem.
